reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate for UV-sensitive syndromes including: Xeroderma Pigmentosum (XP, ~0.05-0.1 per 100k), Cockayne Syndrome (~0.03-0.05 per 100k), and other rare UV-sensitivity disorders (~0.02 per 100k). Total ~0.15 per 100k. Heterogeneous group with significant clinical and genetic variation.
